name: Imagine: Fashion Designer - New York
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Imagine Fashion Designer NY Become a New York's Best Fashion Designer!



As a novice fashion designer, express your creativity in sophisticated design workshops such as tailoring, hair and makeup, and photoshoots. Live in the glamorous world of fashion as you put together stunning fashion shows on the New York runway!
developedBy: Lexis Numérique SA, Virtual Toys, S.L.
